trans-unit.source: Defines the contract a control implements to act as a configuration control for a transformer in a Web Parts connection.
A configuration control can be displayed when a transformer requires a user to configure it.
trans-unit.target: 변환기를 구성 하는 사용자를 해야 하는 경우 구성 컨트롤을 표시할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The configuration control provides a user interface (UI) that allows the user to select which values will be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 구성 컨트롤 사용자가 변환 될 어떤 값을 선택할 수 있도록 사용자 인터페이스 (UI)를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It is rendered in a connections zone.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer.CreateConfigurationControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a configuration control.
You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer.CreateConfigurationControl%2A> method when your transformer requires a customized UI.
trans-unit.target: 재정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer.CreateConfigurationControl%2A> 메서드 여 변환기는 사용자 지정된 UI를 해야 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The configuration control must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl> interface, which includes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl.Cancelled> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl.Succeeded> events.
trans-unit.target: 구성 컨트롤 구현 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl> 포함 된 인터페이스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl.Cancelled> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl.Succeeded> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: These events occur when a transformer control was either not configured or configured successfully, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 이벤트는 변환기 컨트롤이 구성 되었거나, 성공적으로, 각각 구성 하는 경우에 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when transformer configuration is not completed.

The Web Parts control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl> raises this event when a transformer configuration is not completed, either because the user canceled the configuration or because the configuration could not be performed.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 웹 파트 컨트롤 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl> 변환기 구성이 완료 되지 않으면, 사용자를 구성 취소 또는 구성을 수행 하지 못했습니다이 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when transformer configuration is successfully completed.
The Web Parts control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl> raises this event when a transformer configuration is successfully completed.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 웹 파트 컨트롤 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITransformerConfigurationControl> 변환기 구성이 성공적으로 완료 되 면이 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.
